feed.title: Fort St. John - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Fort St. John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 04:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: ESE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain ending this morning then cloudy and 60 percent chance of rain showers. Clearing this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny late in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 February 2023
